turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you today.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to place a drink order to Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. which starbucks did you want to place an order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to place an order to the Starbucks on 800 West Olympic Boulevard, 102, Los Angeles, California.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order the cordusio.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what type of milk did you want in that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. you want 1 grande iced cordusio with whole milk from the starbucks on 800 west olympic blvd in los angeles.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the total is $4.50. i'll place the order now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i've placed the order. the drink will be ready in 10 mins.
